daboross.gemagame.code

Class Projectile

extends java.lang.Object

      Gets the center Y position including the scrolling difference

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(double comX,
          double comY,
          double speedX,
          double speedY,
          int rightEdge,
          int bottomEdge,
          ClassHandler classHandler)
        first definition of this class.
        Parameters:
        comX - This is the starting x Position relative to the scrolling 0,0. Should include the current background scroll
        comY - The starting Y position of this projectile
        speedX - this is the X speed of this projectile for its entire life
        speedY - this is the Y speed of this projectile for its entire life
        rightEdge - this is the width of the game
        bottomEdge - this is the height of the game

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        This function updates the position of this projectile

        public double getCenterY()
        Gets the center Y position including the scrolling difference
        Returns:
        The on-screen Y position of the center of This projectile

      • getCenterX

        public double getCenterX()
        Gets the center X position including the scrolling difference
        Returns:
        The on-screen X position of the center of this Projectile

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection()
        Gets The direction that the projectile is facing, represented with an integer
        Returns:
        The animation Direction this Projectile is facing

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        This function returns the value of the is alive variable. If it is false, this objects should be deleted ASAP
        Returns:
        Whether or not this Projectile is alive
